website_summaries.verdict: A generous quantity of capsules made of high-quality, high-potency, vegetarian ingredients.
pros: 120 tablets per bottle, and you may only have to take one per day for maximum effectiveness
Contains black pepper extract for absorption and 95% curcuminoids
Doesn't contain artificial additives, fillers, or potential allergens such as soy, gluten, or milk
cons: May cause upset stomach or cramping in some individuals, and may not produce results for everyone

customer_reviews.title: I wish vitamin companies would realize that things like this are vitally important
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered my second bottle of this tumeric-curcumin supplement because it works to ease inflammation and aches in my body. I'd been taking a cheap brand from the Big Box stores for years until a friend pointed out that turmeric needs pepper or BioPerine to be absorbed efficiently into the body. I wish vitamin companies would realize that things like this are vitally important, because what is the point of manufacturing supplements that are cheap but don't work? And many of us don't have time to do extensive research. It didn't even take a week for me to notice the difference. Grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Works for Arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Started Turmeric over a year ago and without it my arthritis is unbearable. Also have two elderly dogs on it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good product. My doctor had recommended that I should ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. My doctor had recommended that I should get Turmeric Curcumin with Black Pepper. I had tried another one from a local store and it was definitely not as good as this one. I have to have rotator cuff surgery and had been taking Aleve and Advil for pain but now this is working and I don't have to take the Aleve and Advil.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Cass

customer_reviews.title: Turmeric Curcumin winner
customer_reviews.text: I've just started my second bottle, and it's a continuation of the same product I've been using for several months. I'm very pleased with it's performance. I find that that it's anti-inflammatory properties help me daily as I age. It had been suggested by my mother in law, and she's a retired nurse. I trust her, and it paid off.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Toscano

customer_reviews.title: love the results.
customer_reviews.text: My foot has been very sore lately and I had run out of my first bottle of this Turmeric. When I got this bottle, I started taking it again and my foot is feeling so much better.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: If the product is half as good as the customer service, it's a really great product. I'm on my second bottle of Divine Bounty Turmeric and I went back and forth with Amy from Leading Edge and she answered all of my questions regarding the turmeric. I don't have any chronic conditions I'm treating with the turmeric so I can't really "feel" it working. When you buy supplements like this that aren't regulated by the FDA what you are really buying is the company. Your faith in the company selling the product is the most important part. Amy has given me a high level of faith in the Divine Bounty products.
customer_reviews.author: F1oored

customer_reviews.title: I have been on it almost a month now and pleased to say I have been virtually pain free
customer_reviews.text: I have had severe leg pain for the past 10 years, doctor after doctor. I was told about this so gave it a try. I have been on it almost a month now and pleased to say I have been virtually pain free. From a pain that was at an 8 level on a daily basis down to a 0-2. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've only been on it for a half a month ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been on it for a half a month but I have noticed that no inflammation or swelling in my feet legs and hands I believe it is also had something to do with controlling my blood sugar I need a little more time in order to give it accurate report. The white pad on the top of my foot is used to help with my nerve pain in my feet from the diabetic neuropathy but you can see I have absolutely no swelling in my feet or ankles any longer and I now that it's the turmeric that's doing it thank you so much because for years I was so swollen I could hardly walk on my legs

customer_reviews.title: Not working as described!

I had no problem before starting these pills and i heard of the health benefits so i decided to give them a try! I stopped as of yesterday to see if the problem's stop. i will keep you posted either way! Be cautious!

customer_reviews.text: I originally started turmeric to lose belly fat. But by the 4th day I also discovered that my hands, hips, and back arthritis pain was virtually gone. I never thought I could swing a golf club again, nor do a downward facing dog in yoga. I can do everything now pain free. I still have the belly fat, but who cares? I feel 20 years younger! Only side effects are frequent bowel movements and very yellow.

Eventhough I had taken curcumim before it was the first time I was able to achieve great reduction ín level of pain as I did with this product. It worked for me.

customer_reviews.title: I can turn my head
customer_reviews.text: This is the start of my second bottle, the first was gifted to me. I only take 1 capsule per day. It took just under 1 month to notice a difference. It is really quite amazing. My chronic neck pain of several years is almost unnoticeable. My lower back pain has significantly decreased as well. It has been a wonderful help to me.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Noble

customer_reviews.title: Bioperine may causing problems
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking these twice a day for about a week. It sure seems to be helping to reduce the inflammation from my back pain. Yet, I've been very concerned that I get shortness of breath, needing to breathe in deeply, like I'm having an asthma attack (I'm not naturally asthmatic). I looked into the effects of bioperine and bronchospasms may be associated. I'm going to probably look for a product that contains less bioperine or none. I've read that only 5-15 mg daily is the recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bridell

customer_reviews.title: Helpful with Inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I waited till I had been taking this for a month before reviewing, and I have to say that it seems to be helping tremendously with some knee and other inflammation problems I regularly experience. I'll add that the difference is noticeable after a month now, and I am glad that I do not have to guess at whether it's helping or not. Also, I really liked this brand when comparing it against a few others.
customer_reviews.author: Tea is good

customer_reviews.title: Claims to be 95% curcuminoids but also says "proprietary"
customer_reviews.text: Folks, the word "proprietary" in curcumin supplemets is a way of saying "hiding the fact that we are sprinkling a bit of curcumin in cheaper turmeric. While this one does claim to be standardized to 95% curcuminoids, it also uses the word "proprietary" in its label (as of 5/5/2020). If you are using the amount you are claiming, what is "proprietary"? Sketchy. I would avoid. I'm going back to my Amazon Elements curcumin
customer_reviews.author: Essentialist

customer_reviews.title: Good product average price
customer_reviews.text: Mainly took ten days longer to get here than it should have. Plus there are better options of the same product at a better price.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with bad inflammation in my feet for years. We're talking so bad that I couldn't dream of putting weight on it. I'm forced to stay in bed for days until the pain gets tolerable enough that I can put a little weight on it and limp around everywhere. Which isn't good for anything. I tried everything. Cherry juice, painkillers, various topical pain relief solutions. Nothing seemed to work. Until I looked into the benefits of turmeric. I researched several different brands and settled on this one. I'm pleased to say that it works. I haven't had a flareup in quite a while. I'll definitely be ordering this again, and recommending it to my friends.

Unfortunately, I bought theses quite some time ago and hadn't opened this bottle because I had several bottles of a different brand on hand. Now the time to return to Amazon has expired so I guess I can just flush that money away with the pills! Very disappointed. BUYER BEWARE!

customer_reviews.title: Company hides amount of curcuminoids
customer_reviews.text: When taking Turmeric, it is essential to get 95% standardized curcuminoids so the true amount if curcumin you take is about 1,000 mg a day. Most supplements don't even come close to this amount. By hiding behind their "proprietary complex" this company is hiding the true amount of curcumins in the supplement which tells me this is overpriced turmeric with only a small amount of standardized curcuminoids. Your body knows the difference. This supplement won't help arthritis sufferers.
customer_reviews.author: LucyAnn’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with Divine Bounty’s Turmeric Curcumin
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with Divine Bounty’s Turmeric Curcumin. In fact this is my second order. I had knee surgery almost a year ago and I have been going to a gym regularly to rehabilitate my leg. In order to deal with soreness and not wanting to rely on aspirins, I first tried a different brand of turmeric. Then I stumbled upon Divine Bounty’s Turmeric and decided to give it a try. I believe it is more potent than the other brand, and it is providing me with better relief for my joints. I can definitely feel a difference between the products and I will stick with Divine Bounty’s Turmeric Curcumin.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Really helps
customer_reviews.text: Intuition said get tumeric. Let me tell you, i've been recovering from plastic surgery with conplications for 9 weeks now and after taking this on the second day my pain and inflamation had subsided enough that i could finally sleep on my side after 75 days of being strictly on my back. I'm in the last stage of healing so i cant tell how miraculous it is, but i have seen great improvement to my wounds. Bought it for my dad inbconcert with magnesium pills and he said he noticed a difference to his pain levels on the second day. I give 4 stars because my pee seemed pretty discolored, which i'd guess means it's not fully absorbing?

customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and there isn't much I can do for pain (according to Dr.) I started taking this turmeric curcumin product, two tabs each morning and it seems to help.. Maybe there is less inflammation in my body or I am more flexible. Maybe it raises my mood. The company claims that the product is highly absorbent I have finished one bottle and will order more.

customer_reviews.title: Best turmeric supplement I’ve used.
customer_reviews.text: I began taking turmeric for two reasons. One: the constant pain in my elbows, wrists, and hands. Two: I have an over abundance of visceral fat that I just can’t shake. Since beginning your product, my pain has decreased significantly and I am not doing anything different than I was before I started. Also, I have noticed a slight decrease in waist circumference. My hunger ( I alternate day intermittent fast) has been mostly satiated since beginning your product and I believe that it helps turning white fat cells into brown cells ready for energy burn. I will be reordering. I fully recommend this product. It is the best addition to my daily supplements in over a decade.

customer_reviews.title: A doctor recommended this to me.  It's helped me.

A doctor I know told me he takes it daily and has improved mobility and has lost weight as well. I need it for anti inflammatory properties for an eye issue and my knees. Although sceptical at first, I am a firm believer now.

customer_reviews.title: The Brand to Buy
customer_reviews.text: Recently I read an article that stated the properties in turmeric, enhanced by black pepper, were shown to relieve pain, similar to that of ibuprofen. As a nurse I deal daily with mild back pain and I am aware of the detrimental long term use of ibuprofen on your stomach. Therefore I purchased this product and use it every day, not only to keep the inflammation at bay, but for all the other benefits provided by the turmeric/black pepper combination. Divine Bounty makes a quality product and One to two capsules a day have become part of my daily lifestyle.

customer_reviews.title: Works Over TIME
customer_reviews.text: I take this for arthritis (not RA). This worked for me over a period of several months; it takes that long for benefits to show up. I still take an OTC pain reliever once a week or so. This will not take away all of you pain, but does help to reduce it. However, everyone is different

While explaining the uses of Tumeric to another lady she said her oncologist recommended it after her thyroid surgery. There is no downside to taking Tumeric. This is my second bottle and at my last physical my Blood Pressure was normal ( usually high) and my cholesterol had improved. All my blood work was spot on. The only thing I've changed since my last physical is taking Turmeric and CLA 1250.

I insist that all my supplements be as holistic as possible. Given that I will continue taking this supplement for the rest of my life, it is great that this brand exists. The standards used to manufacture this supplement are outstanding. I endorse this product of Turmeric/Curcumin 100%.

It appeared that issue was from machine that seals cap being defective and not being able to finish attaching safety seal to rim. I do not feel bottle had been tampered with.

customer_reviews.author: Londonlady

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and Reliable Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used turmeric from other companies and have been uncertain of the true components of the product! When I started using Divine Bounty Tumetic product I felt a positive difference in my knee!
customer_reviews.author: Jann Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom who was taking an anti-inflammatory pain reliever every day for back pain. It helped with the back pain but started causing stomach problems. She has been taking this every day instead with no upset stomach and it really helps! She was out for two days while the second bottle was delivered and she said she could definitely tell a difference!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say if it helps with pain and inflammation. I did notice some improvement to my knee pain, but hard to say if it is directly due to the turmeric. worth trying I think It works for me, I have tried several others since then trying to find a better price, but this works the best. does with one pill what others need 2.
customer_reviews.author: Benji

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had been taking another brand of tumeric but was disappointed in the results and in the lack of quality - there was tumeric powder on the outside of the capsules. So, I did lots of research online and found this Divine Bounty product. It is well made, not difficult to swallow and is effective in reducing arthritis pain. I recommend this product and this brand.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: just got this product and starting to use it for arthritis and weight loss
customer_reviews.text: will advise in future how well it seems to work. i'm having terrible arthritis pain in my fingers and swelling in the morning so hoping to see some relief
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ranke

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I will reorder. I ordered another brand but prefer this one because it leaves you with a hint of pepper. I don't mind the size of the pills myself. I divide all my pills that I take together up into groups. Some small, some large, some average. They all come out even and it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: lesliehefner

customer_reviews.title: Life changer thanks?
customer_reviews.text: Totally turned my blood sugar and A1C around and over 10 Hugh other health benefits. Great product great service . With diet and exercise and weight loss now that I feel better....saving me from the poisons from Big Pharm!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Elhart

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried this brand, and it works just as well as others, maybe even better. I take it as an alternative to OTC anti-inflammatory drugs whenever I get that carpal-tunnel like feeling from typing too much. Does the trick and has other health benefits, so you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtad

customer_reviews.title: Formula changed?
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered, and taken this before. This time it really upset my stomach. I'm not sure maybe the formula has changed? I had to stop taking it.
customer_reviews.author: wacusa1

customer_reviews.title: I’m a Believer!
customer_reviews.text: I have both osteo and rheumatoid arthritis, with my hand being specifically impacted. I was having trouble getting past my last flare up until I added a daily dose of your product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: frybaby

customer_reviews.title: Product does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me from a friend for natural inflammation relief. Haven’t taken it very long but I notice a less pain. So far so good and I’m excited to feel better every day.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie

customer_reviews.title: Very effective brand of Tumeric
customer_reviews.text: I have used other brands of Tumeric, but this brand has given me better results. Having had so much pain in the morning and throughout the day, I found that tumeric did help, but Divine Bounty brand made a much larger impact on how I felt. I am not 100% pain free, but I am not incapacitated and I can move freely. The difference has to be in the brand. Happy I changed brands until I found one that really made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: JoGo

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I selected this brand after reading reviews for potency and value of turmeric/curcumin. I just started using it. I am also using Lions Mane mushrooms from this brand which is helping my anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: M. Forbert

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product, No Negatives
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the amount of standardized turmeric in this product. I can't swear that the aches in my joints is entirely due to the product, but nothing else was working until I started using this product. There are so many benefits to Turmeric, esp with pepper to aid absorption. I ordered again, quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous results
customer_reviews.text: Not only is Turmeric exactly what my body needs in minimizing the effects of MS (multiple sclerosis), Divine Bounty's formula has reduced my symptoms to zero. It's the ideal combination of what my body needs. So much so, I know when I've missed taking it. Thank you, Mary & Andrew, for pursuing unmatched quality in your Turmeric product!
customer_reviews.author: AvalonMom

customer_reviews.title: Works good but bad heartburn for me
customer_reviews.text: Gives me horrible indigestion. I do not get it with liquid tumeric.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great inflammation eliminatior
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this due to I have Sarcoidosis , which causes inflammation throughout the body but mostly in the joints, I was having a hard time walking and standing. So far since I've been taking this brand the pain as eased up, going up the stairs and standing is a lot better than before. I will surely purchase more on a monthly basis. It's only been a few weeks and I can feel the difference .
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: so good. I like the larger measure of product per ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I like the larger measure of product per capsule. No weird side effects. Been using curcumin for a couple of years and it really helps with inflammation and pain. Helped both my wife and I get beyond the ever-difficult plantar fascititis. My good blood pressure readings also astound the doctors. Happy and recommend ofren!
customer_reviews.author: Glfredrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This helps with my chronic back pain. Don't know if it will help EVERYONE, but it helps me!
customer_reviews.author: NativeNYer

customer_reviews.title: Best Brand Out There!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been taking this supplement for a few weeks so i can't say if it's totally working but I have read an awful lot about Turmeric/Curcumin/ Black Pepper and this brand keeps coming up on top so I would recommend it. I should be able to up date this review in a month when i've been taking them for a longer stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Yolie

customer_reviews.title: I like to take one capsule a day so I want ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to take one capsule a day so I want higher mg per capsule. This is 750mg, with added bioperine (black pepper) which is needed for it to work. I am on my second bottle, and will continue to buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Judy  Howard

customer_reviews.title: I still feel some muscular pain here and there but I'm much more better than how I've always been
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle product, it seems to have taken care of the pain which is the reason why I even started taking turmeric in the first place. I still feel some muscular pain here and there but I'm much more better than how I've always been.
customer_reviews.author: Nnamdi

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Non gmo, no fillers or binders and contains BioPerine for absorption a healthy, quality supplement that works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Av8tor

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement but has rice in it
customer_reviews.text: I liked this supplement but had to stop taking it because of the rice concentrate--grains make me achy. I had hoped that the amount of rice would be small enough that it wouldn't bother me, but unfortunately that wasn't the case. I've switched to another brand with Longvida Curcumin and things are fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to NSAIDS
customer_reviews.text: I have a torn hip labrum which has caused significant inflamation. I am unable to take NSAIDS because of a prior gastric bypass. I was skeptical to try this, but have been amazed at how much it has improved my pain and therefore, my mobility. I highly recommend this for anyone with inflamation. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Inflammation
customer_reviews.text: Need it for inflammation. Friends have purchased it and it takes time to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Idk yet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been taking these for a week, so I haven’t had enough time to decide if they’re working or not.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the divine bounty turmeric for two weeks for my tendinitis and have already seen an improvement in my range of motion and pain. I was told about this product from a friend who experienced relief from her knee arthritis. Thank you for this .
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great product, delightful company
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my husband, he has server back issues, spinal stenosis, herniated disc, and degenerative disc, and with only 5 days on it he was encouraging me to try it, I have endometriosis. And it has helped me also! And the leading group that sells it has been amazing. I have received a few emails from them, thanking me for purchase, making sure I received it, and to see if it is helping! Will definitely buy again from them!
customer_reviews.author: Jena M. Hickman

product_meta.title: Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine Black Pepper Extract - 750mg per Capsule, 120 Veg. Capsules - GMO Free Tumeric, Standardized to 95% Curcuminoids for Maximum Potency
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY INGREDIENTS in easy to swallow capsules.
Proudly made in the USA in an inspected facility following strict cGMP guidelines.

50% MORE POTENT, BEST VALUE - Our Turmeric Curcumin with BioPerine formula is the most potent on the market. A highly POTENT 750mg per capsule (most other brands are only 500mg per capsule). Turmeric also contains beta-carotene, vitamin C and calcium.

HIGHEST QUALITY INGREDIENTS - Not only is our tumeric curcumin supplement more potent, we use the patented black pepper extract BioPerine (5mg) for increased absorption and bioavailability. Curcumin with black pepper is essential in good curcumin supplements. We only use the best, because you deserve the best!

STANDARDIZED 95% CURCUMINOIDS - Normal turmeric only contains 2-6% curcumin. Yet studies show much of the health benefits come from the curcumin found inside. Beware of 'turmeric curcumin' formulas that simply contain a high dose of regular turmeric. We include Curcumin standardized to 95% curcuminoids, which means you're getting a highly potent dose of concentrated curcumin (not just regular turmeric).

FEEL THE DIFFERENCE - We stand behind our tumeric curcumin supplement and are proud to have the best formula on the market. Give our tumeric pills a try and if you don't feel any difference, let us know.

CLEAN, PURE & MADE IN USA - Many competitors include ingredients that are harmful or you do not need. Our formula is Gluten FREE and has no GMOS, binders, fillers, preservatives, artificial ingredients or stearates. There is also no soy, milk, egg, shellfish, wheat, peanuts or any other ingredients that shouldn't be in there. Best of all, it's made in an inspected facility following strict GMP guidelines to ensure purity and potency.
